desc_meta_frontend: A comprehensive program covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and front-end best practices.
desc_css_basic: Demonstrates understanding of basic CSS concepts and styling web pages.
desc_software_engineer: Covers core software engineering principles and problem-solving skills.
desc_js_basic: Validates knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals and syntax.
desc_sql_intermediate: Demonstrates ability to write intermediate SQL queries and manage databases.
desc_data_analysis: Focused on data analysis techniques using Python, statistics, and real-world datasets.
desc_web_dev_intern: Hands-on internship focused on web development projects and teamwork.
desc_mobile_dev_intern: Internship focused on building and testing mobile applications.
desc_business_analytics: Internship involving business analytics tasks and data-driven decision making.
